EmailTemplate.subject: Learn about Spring Boot and Spring Security at the G3 Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {Recipient Name}, Spring at G3 Summit - November 28—December 1, 2016 in Fort Lauderdale. Register here <[[https://g3summit.com/]]>.
Learn about Spring Boot and Spring Security at the G3 Summit! G3 Summit is an annual event for the Groovy, Grails, and Gradle (G3) community. This is your chance to learn awesome Groovy/Grails/Gradle technologies from project leaders, committers, authors, and industry experts, and hear how Spring Security and Spring Boot have a key role in that ecosystem.
Grails 3 for Spring Boot Developers Jeff Scott Brown
Grails 3 is a high productivity web framework for The JVM. Grails 3 is built on top of Spring Boot. This session provides an introduction and overview of the framework for developers who are familiar with Spring.
A Dive Into the Suite of Grails Spring Security Plugins Colin Harrington
Securing your application with Spring Security has been the defacto standard in Grails. There is a suite of plugins at your disposal that give us a great start when securing our applications.
We’ll cover the suite of spring-security related plugins, how they plug into Spring Security and how they interact with each other. We’ll dive into the underpinnings of Authentication Providers, stateless authentication, ACLs and more.
Creating Application with Grails, Angular JS, and Spring Security Álvaro Sánchez-Mariscal
Grails 3.1 enhances and improves the profile system introduced in Grails 3.0. One of the new profiles ease the creation and development of applications where the the front-end is an Angular JS application, and the backend is a Grails REST API. In this session, Álvaro (member of the Grails team at OCI, Grails committer and author of several plugins) will demonstrate how to use the Angular profile to create an application using Grails 3.1, Angular JS and Spring Security REST.
Full-Day Workshops G3 Summit will feature 5 full-day workshop options. You must bring your laptop. G3 Summit workshops are hands-on coding events. Full-day workshops are included in the standard conference registration at no additional charge.
- A Thorough Introduction to Grails 3 - Applying Groovy Metaprogramming - Build Web Applications with Ratpack - Gradle Intro Workshop I - Spock Workshop
We hope to see you there!
